skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the second Type 1936 destroyer, Z18~! You can call me Hans, although it sounds a little boyish... Hm? I'm really different from other Iron Blood girls? Heheh, a smile makes all the difference~
skins.acquisition: Nice to meet you, I'm Z18! I'm the girl whose smile will reach everyone's hearts~
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander~ Have you smiled yet today?
skins.details: Okay, Commander! Let's see aaaa... SMILE!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Everyone from Iron Blood are either obsessed with war or say a bunch of stuff that doesn't make sense... and my mission is to make them all smile!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I prescribe a smile to anyone who's feeling afraid~
skins.secretaryIdle3: I believe that, deep down, there's a smile in everyone's hearts! Anyone can smile once they know that!
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you need anything from me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You can't do whatever you want just because I'm smiling! Hmph!
